titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Lewis Steven Fiske Pilcher photograph collection.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Lewis Steven Fiske Pilcher photograph collection.

archdesc.bioghist: Graduate of University of Michigan Medical School, class of 1866.
archdesc.scopecontent: Portrait (engraving); also half-tone of bookplate used on Pilcher gift of medical books to the University of Michigan.
